mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_NEWS WHERE 1=1
AND KIND=#{cate}
AND KIND='2' AND VIEW_START_DATE <= TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') AND (END_DATE is null or END_DATE >= TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') )
AND KIND='2' AND VIEW_START_DATE <= TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') >= END_DATE

SELECT (TOTAL_RECORDS +1 - RNUM) DESC_RNUM,DATA.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER() TOTAL_RECORDS, DATA.* , DECODE(KIND,'1','notice','2','event','3','media') AS KIND_CODE , DECODE(KIND,'1','공지사항','2','이벤트','3','미디어') AS KIND_NAME , CASE WHEN START_DATE > TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') THEN 'M' WHEN START_DATE <= TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') AND (END_DATE IS NULL OR TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') <= END_DATE) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DATE_STAT FROM (
SELECT NEWS_UID , POINT_CODE , KIND , HIT , VIEW_START_DATE , VIEW_END_DATE , START_DATE , END_DATE , WRITE_TYPE , TITLE , FILE_LIST , FILE_LIST_FULL , FILE_CONTENT , FILE_CONTENT_FULL , CONTENTS , INST_IP , INST_ID , INST_DATE , UPDT_IP , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DATE , CASE WHEN START_DATE IS NULL AND END_DATE IS NULL THEN '1' WHEN START_DATE > TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') THEN '1' WHEN START_DATE <= TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') AND (END_DATE IS NULL OR TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') <= END_DATE) THEN '1' ELSE '2' END AS VIEW_SORT FROM TB_NEWS WHERE 1=1
and KIND=#{cate} AND VIEW_START_DATE <= TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') AND (END_DATE is null OR TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') <= END_DATE)
and KIND= '2' AND VIEW_START_DATE <= TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') >= END_DATE
ORDER BY VIEW_SORT ASC, NEWS_UID DESC
) DATA ) DATA WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ((#{page}-1) * #{rows} + 1) and (#{page} * #{rows})

SELECT NEWS_UID , POINT_CODE , KIND , HIT , VIEW_START_DATE , VIEW_END_DATE , START_DATE , END_DATE , WRITE_TYPE , TITLE , FILE_LIST , FILE_LIST_FULL , FILE_CONTENT , FILE_CONTENT_FULL , CONTENTS , INST_IP , INST_ID , INST_DATE , UPDT_IP , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DATE , TO_CHAR(INST_DATE,'yyyy.mm.dd') AS INST_DATE_TXT , DECODE(KIND,'1','notice','event') AS KIND_CODE , DECODE(KIND,'1','공지사항','이벤트') AS KIND_NAME , CASE WHEN START_DATE > TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') THEN 'M' WHEN START_DATE <= TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') AND (END_DATE IS NULL OR TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy.mm.dd') <= END_DATE) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DATE_STAT FROM TB_NEWS WHERE NEWS_UID=${num}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NEWS_UID , KIND , TITLE , INST_ID , INST_DATE , TO_CHAR(INST_DATE,'yyyy.mm.dd') AS INST_DATE_TXT FROM TB_NEWS WHERE NEWS_UID > #{num}
and KIND=#{cate} ORDER BY NEWS_UID ASC )DATA WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NEWS_UID , KIND , TITLE , INST_ID , INST_DATE , TO_CHAR(INST_DATE,'yyyy.mm.dd') AS INST_DATE_TXT FROM TB_NEWS WHERE NEWS_UID < #{num}
and KIND=#{cate} ORDER BY NEWS_UID DESC )DATA WHERE ROWNUM=1
